title: Bug 5340 - Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When cancelling the process of adding an exception breakpoint, the breakpoint is still added to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective.
EB: Cancelling the process of adding an exception breakpoint should prevent the breakpoint from being added to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective.
SR: 1) Go to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective. 2) Click the J! button to add an exception breakpoint. 3) In the progress dialog, click cancel.
